name: JsMacros
description: Functions that interact directly with JsMacros or Events. This is the main entry point library that provides access to JsMacros core functionality including script execution, event management, and configuration access.
overview: The JsMacros library is available to scripts via the global `JsMacros` variable and provides essential functions for running scripts, managing events, and accessing core JsMacros services.

methods.name: getProfile
methods.description: Returns the JsMacros profile class that manages user settings and script configurations.
examples:
const profile = JsMacros.getProfile();
Chat.log(`Current profile: ${profile.getName()}`);

methods.name: getConfig
methods.description: Returns the JsMacros configuration management class that handles all configuration settings.

methods.name: getServiceManager
methods.description: Returns the service manager for managing background scripts (services) that run continuously.

methods.name: getOpenContexts
methods.description: Returns a list of non-garbage-collected ScriptContext instances that are currently running.

methods.name: runScript
methods.signature: runScript(language: string, script: string, file: string, event: BaseEvent, callback: MethodWrapper)
methods.description: Runs a script file or string with optional parameters and callback.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Path to the script file relative to the macro folder

parameters.name: fakeEvent
parameters.description: Optional event to pass to the script

examples:
// Run a script file
JsMacros.runScript("examples/hello.js");

// Run a string as script
JsMacros.runScript("javascript", "Chat.log('Hello from dynamic script!');");

methods.name: wrapScriptRun
methods.signature: wrapScriptRun(language: string, script: string, file: string)
methods.description: Wraps a script execution as a MethodWrapper that can be called multiple times.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Path to script file (or file name for error reporting if wrapping string)

examples:
// Wrap a string script with file reference
const dynamicScript = JsMacros.wrapScriptRun("javascript", "return args[0] * args[1];", "multiply.js");

methods.name: wrapScriptRunAsync
methods.signature: wrapScriptRunAsync(language: string, script: string, file: string)
methods.description: Wraps a script execution as an asynchronous MethodWrapper for non-blocking execution.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Path to script file (or file name for error reporting if wrapping string)

methods.name: on
methods.signature: on(event: string, filterer: EventFilterer, joined: boolean, callback: MethodWrapper)
methods.description: Creates a persistent event listener that can be more efficient than running script files when used properly.

parameters.name: joined
parameters.description: Whether the event should be joined (wait for completion)

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when event triggers

methods.name: once
methods.signature: once(event: string, joined: boolean, callback: MethodWrapper)
methods.description: Creates a single-run event listener that automatically removes itself after triggering once.

parameters.name: joined
parameters.description: Whether the event should be joined (wait for completion)

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when event triggers

methods.name: off
methods.description: Removes an event listener from all events or a specific event.
examples:
// Remove from specific event
JsMacros.off("Key", listener);

methods.name: disableAllListeners
methods.description: Disables all listeners for a specific event or globally, including JsMacros' own internal listeners.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specific event to remove all listeners from (optional)

examples:
// Disable all listeners for specific event
JsMacros.disableAllListeners("RecvMessage");

// Disable ALL listeners globally
JsMacros.disableAllListeners();

methods.name: disableScriptListeners
methods.description: Disables only user-created event listeners (from on(), once(), waitForEvent()), preserving internal JsMacros listeners.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specific event to remove script listeners from (optional)

examples:
// Disable only script listeners for specific event
JsMacros.disableScriptListeners("Key");

// Disable all script listeners globally
JsMacros.disableScriptListeners();

methods.name: waitForEvent
methods.signature: waitForEvent(event: string, join: boolean, filter: MethodWrapper, runBeforeWaiting: MethodWrapper)
methods.description: Waits for a specific event to occur, optionally filtering events and providing early exit functionality.

parameters.name: join
parameters.description: Whether to join the event (default: false)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Optional filter function, returns true when condition met

parameters.name: runBeforeWaiting
parameters.description: Optional function to run before waiting for thread safety

methods.name: listeners
methods.description: Returns a list of script-added listeners for a specific event.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Event name to get listeners for

methods.name: createEventFilterer
methods.description: Creates an event filterer to reduce lag when listening to frequently triggered events.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Event name to create filterer for

methods.name: createComposedEventFilterer
methods.description: Creates a composed event filterer that combines multiple filterers with AND/OR logic.

methods.name: createModulusEventFilterer
methods.description: Creates a modulus event filterer that only lets every nth event pass through.

parameters.name: quotient
parameters.description: Process every nth event (e.g., 10 = every 10th event)

methods.name: invertEventFilterer
methods.description: Inverts a base filterer's result, making it match the opposite conditions.

methods.name: createCustomEvent
methods.description: Creates a custom event object that can trigger custom events with optional GUI registration.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: Name of the custom event (should not conflict with existing events)

methods.name: assertEvent
methods.description: Asserts that an event is of the correct type for type safety and converts the event type in TypeScript.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens a file with the default system program. Paths are relative to the script's folder. (Deprecated)

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: File path relative to script folder

examples:
// Deprecated - use Utils library instead
JsMacros.open("config/settings.txt");

methods.name: openUrl
methods.description: Opens a URL with the default system web browser. (Deprecated)
examples:
// Deprecated - use Utils library instead
JsMacros.openUrl("https://github.com/wagyourtail/JsMacros");
